original: Anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto, balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ.
analyzed: an ācariyako pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhi tattha ca sabbaññu tam pattaḥ balesu ca vasībhāva

original: Atītaṁ ādisatīti bhagavā attano ca paresañca atītampi ādisati, anāgatampi ādisati, paccuppannampi ādisati.
analyzed: atītam ādisati iti bhagavā attano ca paresam ca atītam api ādisati anāgatam api ādisati paccuppannam api ādisati

original: Bhagavā attano atītaṁ ekampi jātiṁ ādisati, dvepi jātiyo ādisati, tissopi jātiyo
analyzed: bhagavā attanaḥ atītam ekam pi jātim ādisati dve pi jātiyaḥ ādisati tissaḥ api jātiyaḥ

original: ādisati, catassopi jātiyo ādisati, pañcapi jātiyo ādisati, dasapi jātiyo ādisati,
analyzed: ādisati catasso api jātiyaḥ ādisati pañca api jātiyaḥ ādisati dasa api jātiyaḥ ādisati

original: vīsampi jātiyo ādisati, tiṁsampi jātiyo ādisati, cattālīsampi jātiyo ādisati, paññāsampi
analyzed: vīsampi jātiyaḥ ādisati tisampi jātiyaḥ ādisati cattālīsampi jātiyaḥ ādisati paññāsampi
aneke api sa vaṭṭa vivaṭṭa kappe ādisati

original: “amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ;
analyzed: amutra asim eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi

original: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti.
analyzed: tatra apāsim eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto saḥ tatas cutaḥ idhu upapanno ti

original: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ ādisati.
analyzed: iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam ādisati

original: Bhagavā paresaṁ atītaṁ ekampi jātiṁ ādisati, dvepi jātiyo ādisati …pe…
analyzed: bhagavā paresam atītam ekam pi jātim ādisati dve api jātiyaḥ ādisati pe
aneke api sa vaṭṭa vivaṭṭa kappe ādisati

original: “amutrāsi evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādi;
analyzed: amutra asi eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi

original: tatrāpāsi evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti.
analyzed: tatra apāsi eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto saḥ tatas cutaḥ idhu upapanno ti

original: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ ādisati.
analyzed: iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam ādisati

original: Bhagavā pañca jātakasatāni bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṁ ādisati, mahāpadāniyasuttantaṁ
analyzed: bhagavā pañca jātaka satāni bhāsantaḥ attano ca paresam ca atītam ādisati mahāpadāniya suttanta

original: bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṁ ādisati, mahāsudassaniyasuttantaṁ bhāsanto attano
analyzed: bhāsantaḥ attano ca paresam ca atītam ādisati mahāsudassaniya suttantam bhāsantaḥ attano

original: ca paresañca atītaṁ ādisati, mahāgovindiyasuttantaṁ bhāsanto attano ca paresañca
analyzed: ca paresam ca atītam ādisati mahāgovindiya suttantam bhāsantaḥ attano ca paresam ca

original: atītaṁ ādisati, maghadeviyasuttantaṁ bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṁ ādisati.
analyzed: atītam ādisati maghadeviya suttantam bhāsantaḥ attano ca paresam ca atītam ādisati

original: “atītaṁ kho, cunda, addhānaṁ ārabbha tathāgatassa satānusāriñāṇaṁ hoti.
analyzed: atītam kho cunda addhānam ārabbha tathāgatassa sata anusāri ñāṇam hoti

original: paccuppannañca kho, cunda, addhānaṁ ārabbha tathāgatassa bodhijaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppajjati—
analyzed: paccuppannam ca kho cunda addhānam ārabbha tathāgatassa bodhi jam ñāṇam uppajjati
ayam antimā jāti natthi dāni punabbhavoti
indriya para upari yatta ñāṇam tathāgatassa tathāgata bala sattānam āsaya anusaya ñāṇa

original: tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ, yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇaṁ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ, mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā
analyzed: tathāgatassa tathāgata bala yamaka pāṭihīre ñāṇam tathāgatassa tathāgata bala mahā karuṇā samāpattiyā

original: ñāṇaṁ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ, sabbaññutañāṇaṁ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ, anāvaraṇañāṇaṁ
analyzed: ñāṇam tathāgatassa tathāgata bala sabbaññuta ñāṇam tathāgatassa tathāgata bala anāvaraṇa ñāṇa

original: tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ, sabbattha asaṅgamappaṭihatamanāvaraṇañāṇaṁ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṁ.
analyzed: tathāgatassa tathāgata bala sabbattha asaṅgam appaṭihatam anāvaraṇa ñāṇam tathāgatassa tathāgata bala

original: Evaṁ bhagavā attano ca paresañca atītampi ādisati anāgatampi ādisati paccuppannampi ādisati ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāsetīti—
analyzed: evam bhagavā attano ca paresam ca atītam api ādisati anāgatam api ādisati paccuppannam api ādisati ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāseti iti
i t ca ati pada sandhi pe
posālo ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmam pe abhilāpo ti
anejaḥ chinna sa sayaḥ ti ejā vuccati taṇhā

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Sā ejā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: sā ejā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavataḥ pahīnā ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: dukkhepi na iñjati na calati na vedhati nappavedhati na sampavedhatīti anejo.
analyzed: dukkhe pi na iñjati na calati na vedhati na pavedhati na sampavedhati iti anejaḥ
chinna sasayaḥ ti sasayaḥ vuccati vicikicchā
dukkhe kaṅkhā pe chambhi tattam cittassa manovilekho

original: So saṁsayo buddhassa bhagavato pahīno chinno ucchinno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭinissaggo paṭippassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍho.
analyzed: so sa sayaḥ buddhassa bhagavataḥ pahīnaḥ chinnaḥ ucchinnaḥ samucchinnaḥ vūpasantaḥ paṭinissaggo paṭippassaddhaḥ abhabba uppattikaḥ ñāṇa agginā daḍḍho

original: Pāraguṁ sabbadhammānanti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṁ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: pāragum sabba dhammānan ti bhagavā sabba dhammānam abhiññā pāragū pariññā pāragū pahāna pāragū bhāvanā pāragū sacchikiriyā pāragū samāpatti pāragū abhiññā pāragū sabba dhammānam pe
jāti maraṇa sasāraḥ na atthi tassa punabbhavaḥ ti

original: Atthi pañhena āgamanti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi …pe…
analyzed: atthi pañhena āgamanti pañhena atthikaḥ āgatomhi pe
vibhūta rūpa saññissa ati katamā rūpa saññā

original: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṁ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṁ—
analyzed: rūpāvacara samāpattim samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjāni tatta

original: Vibhūtarūpasaññissāti catasso arūpasamāpattiyo paṭiladdhassa rūpasaññā vibhūtā honti vigatā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti—
analyzed: vibhūta rūpa saññissa ati catasso arūpa samāpattiyaḥ paṭiladdhassa rūpa saññā vibhūtāḥ honti vigatā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattā ati

original: Sabbakāyappahāyinoti sabbo tassa paṭisandhiko rūpakāyo pahīno, tadaṅgasamatikkamā vikkhambhanappahānena pahīno tassa rūpakāyoti—
analyzed: sabba kāya ppahāyino ti sabbaḥ tassa paṭisandhikaḥ rūpa kāyaḥ pahīnaḥ tad aṅga samatikkamā vikkhambhana ppahānena pahīnaḥ tassa rūpa kāyaḥ ti

original: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, natthi kiñcīti passatoti.
analyzed: ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca na atthi kiñci iti passatoti
na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti
na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti

original: Yaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṁ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṁ abhāveti, vibhāveti, antaradhāpeti, “natthi kiñcī”ti passati—
analyzed: yam viññāṇañca āyatana samāpattim sataḥ samāpajjitvā tatas vuṭṭhahitvā tañca eva viññāṇam abhāveti vibhāveti antaradhāpeti natthi kiñci iti passati
taṅkāraṇā na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti iti

original: ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca natthi kiñcīti passato.
analyzed: ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca na atthi kiñci iti passato

original: Bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko …pe… pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṁsotipi sakko.
analyzed: bhagavā sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ itipi sakko pe pahīna bhaya bheravaḥ vigata loma hasaḥ itipi sakko

original: Ñāṇaṁ sakkānupucchāmīti tassa ñāṇaṁ pucchāmi, paññaṁ pucchāmi, sambuddhaṁ pucchāmi.
analyzed: ñāṇam sakkā anupucchāmi iti tassa ñāṇam pucchāmi paññam pucchāmi sambuddham pucchāmi
kīdisam ki saṇṭhitam ki pakāram ki paṭibhāgam ñāṇam icchitabbanti

original: Kathaṁ neyyo tathāvidhoti kathaṁ so netabbo vinetabbo anunetabbo paññāpetabbo nijjhāpetabbo pekkhetabbo pasādetabbo?
analyzed: katham neyyaḥ tathāvidhaḥ ti katham so netabbaḥ vinetabbaḥ anunetabbaḥ paññāpetabbaḥ nijjhāpetabbaḥ pekkhetabbaḥ pasādetabbaḥ

original: Tathāvidhoti tathāvidho tādiso tassaṇṭhito tappakāro tappaṭibhāgo yo so ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattilābhīti—
analyzed: tathāvidhaḥ ti tathāvidhaḥ tādiso tad saṇṭhito tad pakāro tad paṭibhāgo yo so ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti lābhī iti

original: Viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbāti bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti, paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti.
analyzed: viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyo sabbā ti bhagavā abhisaṅkhāra vasena catassaḥ viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti paṭisandhi vasena satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti

original: Kathaṁ bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti?
analyzed: katham bhagavā abhisaṅkhāra vasena catassaḥ viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti

original: “rūpupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: rūpa upayam vā bhikkhave viññāṇam tiṭṭhamānam tiṭṭheyya rūpa ārammaṇam rūpa ppatiṭṭham nandu upasecanam vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjeyya

original: saṅkhārupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya, saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
analyzed: saṅkhāra upayam vā bhikkhave viññāṇam tiṭṭhamānam tiṭṭheyya saṅkhāra ārammaṇam saṅkhāra ppatiṭṭham nandu upasecanam vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjeyya ati

original: Evaṁ bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti.
analyzed: evam bhagavā abhisaṅkhāra vasena catassaḥ viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti

original: Kathaṁ bhagavā paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti?
analyzed: katham bhagavā paṭisandhi vasena satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti
santi bhikkhave sattāḥ nānatta kāyāḥ nānatta saññino

original: seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
analyzed: seyyathā api manussāḥ ekacce ca devāḥ ekacce ca vinipātikā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā brahmakāyikā paṭhamābhinibbattā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattāḥ nānatta kāyāḥ ekatta saññinaḥ seyyathā api devāḥ brahmakāyikā paṭhama abhinibbattā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā ābhassarā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattāḥ ekatta kāyāḥ nānatta saññinaḥ seyyathā api devāḥ ābhassarā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattāḥ ekatta kāyāḥ ekatta saññinaḥ seyyathā api devā subha kiṇhā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā, ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattā sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsa anañca āyatana upagā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma, anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattā sabbaso ākāsānañca āyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatana upagā

original: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma, natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave sattā sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatana upagā

original: Evaṁ bhagavā paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānātīti—
analyzed: evam bhagavā paṭisandhi vasena satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ jānāti iti

original: Posālāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: posālāti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Abhijānanti abhijānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto tathāgato.
analyzed: abhijānanti abhijānantaḥ vijānantaḥ paṭivijānantaḥ paṭivijjhantaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: “atītañcepi kho, cunda, hoti abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, na taṁ tathāgato byākaroti.
analyzed: atītam ca ipi kho cunda hoti abhūtam ataccham anattha sañhita na tam tathāgataḥ byākaroti

original: Atītañcepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, tampi tathāgato na byākaroti.
analyzed: atītam ce pi cunda hoti bhūtam taccham anattha sañhita tam pi tathāgataḥ na byākaroti

original: Atītañcepi kho, cunda, hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tasseva pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
analyzed: atītam ca ipi kho cunda hoti bhūtam taccham attha sañhita tatra kālaññū tathāgataḥ hoti tassa iva pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya

original: paccuppannañcepi, cunda, hoti abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, na taṁ tathāgato byākaroti.
analyzed: paccuppannam ca ipi cunda hoti abhūtam ataccham anattha sañhita na tam tathāgataḥ byākaroti

original: Paccuppannañcepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, tampi tathāgato na byākaroti.
analyzed: paccuppannam ca ipi cunda hoti bhūtam taccham anattha sañhita tam pi tathāgataḥ na byākaroti

original: Paccuppannañcepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
analyzed: paccuppannam ca ipi cunda hoti bhūtam attha sañhita tatra kālaññū tathāgataḥ hoti tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya

original: Iti kho, cunda, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu dhammesu tathāgato kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī.
analyzed: iti kho cunda atīta anāgata paccuppannesu dhammesu tathāgataḥ kāla vādī bhūta vādī attha vādī dhamma vādī vinaya vādī

original: Yaṁ kho, cunda, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
analyzed: yam kho cunda sa devakassa lokassa sa mārakassa sa brahmakassa sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā

original: pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ
analyzed: pajāya sa deva manussāya diṭṭham sutam mutam viññātam pattam pariyesitam anuvicarita

original: Yañca, cunda, rattiṁ tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṁ
analyzed: yañca cunda rattim tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambujjhati yañca rattim

original: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṁ etasmiṁ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati
analyzed: an upādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyati yam etasmin antare bhāsati lapati niddisati

original: sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti no aññathā.
analyzed: sabbam tam tathā iva hoti no aññathā

original: Sadevake, cunda, loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī.
analyzed: sa devake cunda loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā pajāya sa deva manussāya tathāgataḥ abhibhū an abhibhūtaḥ vasa vattī

original: Tiṭṭhantamenaṁ jānātīti bhagavā idhatthaññeva jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena—
analyzed: tiṭṭhantam enam jānāti iti bhagavā idhatthaññā eva jānāti kamma abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: “ayaṁ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam puggalo kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjissati iti
bhagavā idhatthaññā iva jānāti kamma abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: “ayaṁ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṁ upapajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam puggalo kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā tiracchānayonim upapajjissati iti
bhagavā idhatthaññā iva jānāti kamma abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: “ayaṁ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā pettivisayaṁ upapajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam puggalo kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā pettivisayam upapajjissati iti
bhagavā idhatthaññā iva jānāti kamma abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: “ayaṁ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā manussesu uppajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam puggalo kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā manussesu uppajjissati iti
bhagavā idhatthaññā iva jānāti kamma abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: “ayaṁ puggalo suppaṭipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjissatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam puggalo suppaṭipannaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissati iti

original: “idha panāhaṁ, sāriputta, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi—
analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘tathāyaṁ puggalo paṭipanno, tathā ca iriyati, tañca maggaṁ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjissatī’ti.
analyzed: tathā ayam puggalaḥ paṭipannaḥ tathā ca iriyati tam ca maggam samārūḍhaḥ yathā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjissati iti

analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

analyzed: tathā ayam puggalaḥ paṭipannaḥ tathā ca iriyati tam ca maggam samārūḍhaḥ yathā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā tiracchānayonim upapajjissati iti

analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

analyzed: idha pana āha sāriputta ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘tathāyaṁ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṁ samārūḷho, yathā āsavānaṁ
analyzed: tathā ayam puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tam ca maggam samārūḍhaḥ yathā

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā
analyzed: khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā

original: Dhimuttanti vimokkhena dhimuttaṁ tatrādhimuttaṁ tadadhimuttaṁ tadādhipateyyaṁ.
analyzed: dhimuttanti vimokkhena dhimuttam tatra adhimuttam tat adhimuttam tad ādhipateyya

original: “ayaṁ puggalo rūpādhimutto saddādhimutto gandhādhimutto rasādhimutto phoṭṭhabbādhimutto
analyzed: ayam puggalaḥ rūpa adhimuttaḥ sadda adhimuttaḥ gandha adhimuttaḥ rasa adhimuttaḥ phoṭṭhabba adhimuttaḥ

original: kulādhimutto gaṇādhimutto āvāsādhimutto lābhādhimutto yasādhimutto pasaṁsādhimutto
analyzed: kula adhimuttaḥ gaṇa adhimuttaḥ āvāsa adhimuttaḥ lābha adhimuttaḥ yasa adhimuttaḥ pasasa adhimuttaḥ
sukha adhimuttaḥ cīvara adhimuttaḥ piṇḍapāta adhimuttaḥ senāsana adhimuttaḥ gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāra adhimuttaḥ
suttanta adhimuttaḥ vinaya adhimuttaḥ abhidhamma adhimuttaḥ āraññaka aṅga adhimuttaḥ piṇḍapātika aṅga adhimuttaḥ
pasukūlika aṅga adhimuttaḥ tecīvarika aṅga adhimuttaḥ sa padāna cārika aṅga adhimuttaḥ khalu pacchābhattika aṅga adhimuttaḥ
nesajji kaṅga adhimuttaḥ yathā santhati kaṅga adhimuttaḥ paṭhama jhāna adhimuttaḥ dutiya jhāna adhimuttaḥ
tatiya jhāna adhimutto catuttha jhāna adhimuttaḥ ākāsānañcāyatana samāpatta adhimuttaḥ viññāṇañcāyatana samāpatta adhimuttaḥ
ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatta adhimuttaḥ nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpatta adhimuttaḥ ti dhimutta

original: Tapparāyaṇanti ākiñcaññāyatanamayaṁ tapparāyaṇaṁ kammaparāyaṇaṁ vipākaparāyaṇaṁ kammagarukaṁ paṭisandhigarukaṁ.
analyzed: tad parāyaṇanti ākiñcaññāyatana mayam tad parāyaṇam kamma parāyaṇam vipāka parāyaṇam kamma garukam paṭisandhi garuka
na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpatti parāyaṇaḥ ti

original: Ākiñcaññasambhavaṁ ñatvāti ākiñcaññasambhavoti vuccati ākiñcaññāyatanasaṁvattaniko kammābhisaṅkhāro.
analyzed: ākiñcañña sambhavam ñatvā ti ākiñcañña sambhavo ti vuccati ākiñcañña āyatana savattaniko kamma abhisaṅkhāro
ākiñcaññāyatana savattanikam kamma abhisaṅkhāram ākiñcañña sambhavo ti ñatvā laggananti

original: ñatvā, bandhananti ñatvā, palibodhoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvāti—
analyzed: ñatvā ñatvā ñatvā palibodhā iti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā ati
nandi sayojanam iti iti nandi sayojanam vuccati arūpa rāgo

original: Arūparāgena taṁ kammaṁ laggaṁ laggitaṁ palibuddhaṁ arūparāgaṁ nandisaṁyojananti ñatvā,
analyzed: arūpa rāgena tam kammam laggam laggitam palibuddham arūpa rāgam nandi sayojanam ti ñatvā

original: laggananti ñatvā, bandhananti ñatvā, palibodhoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā
analyzed: ñatvā bandhananti ñatvā palibodhā iti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā

original: Itīti padasandhi padasaṁsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṁ itīti—
analyzed: iti iti pada sandhi pada sasaggaḥ pada pāripūrī akkhara samavāyaḥ byañjana siliṭṭha tā pada anupubba tā apetam iti iti

original: Evametaṁ abhiññāyāti evaṁ etaṁ abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvāti—
analyzed: evam etam abhiññāya ati evam etam abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā iti

original: Tatthāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte cittacetasike dhamme aniccato vipassati, dukkhato vipassati, rogato …pe…
analyzed: tattha āti ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpajjitvā tatas vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte citta cetasike dhamme aniccataḥ vipassati dukkhataḥ vipassati rogato pe

original: nissaraṇato vipassati dakkhati oloketi nijjhāyati upaparikkhatīti—
analyzed: nissaraṇataḥ vipassati dakkhati oloketi nijjhāyati upaparikkhati iti

original: Etaṁ ñāṇaṁ tathaṁ tassāti etaṁ ñāṇaṁ tacchaṁ bhūtaṁ yāthāvaṁ aviparītaṁ tassāti—
analyzed: etam ñāṇam tatham tassa ati etam ñāṇam taccham bhūtam yāthāvam aviparītam tassa ati

original: Brāhmaṇoti sattannaṁ dhammānaṁ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo …pe… asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmāti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇo ti dhammānam bāhitattā brāhmaṇo asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmā ati

original: Brāhmaṇassa vusīmatoti puthujjanakalyāṇaṁ upādāya satta sekkhā appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya vasanti saṁvasanti āvasanti parivasanti;
analyzed: brāhmaṇassa puthujjana kalyāṇam upādāya satta sekkhāḥ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya a sacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya vasanti savasanti āvasanti parivasanti

original: arahā vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,
analyzed: arahā vusitavā kata karaṇīyaḥ ohita bhāraḥ an uppatta sadattho parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanaḥ sammad aññā vimutto
so ciṇṇa caraṇo pe jāti maraṇa sa sāro
satthā me bhante bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi iti
